name: Perth Brewery IPYAY Non-Alcoholic IPA
description: Looking for a non-alc IPA that won’t put a hitch in your giddy-up?Hop in the saddle! Perth Brewery non-alc ipYaY! will have you hollering yippie-yi-yay! Calories - 76 Carbohydrates - 14 gSugars - 2g 0.4% ABV

name: Barrfly Non-Alcoholic Piña Colada
description: Indulge in the Piña Colada Cocktail flavors of pineapple and coconut that will transport you to the tropics (and might get you singing "If you like Piña Coladas..." without any guilt! Perfect for any occasion, Barrfly's premium non-alcoholic piña colada mocktails offer a delightful escape to paradise. Order now and enjoy a refreshing, guilt-free treat! Flavours / Notes: coconut, pineapple, vanilla and rum Ingredients: Carbonated water, cane sugar, natural flavor, citric acid, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, ascorbic acid, caramel, tartrazine Origin: Québec, Canada Nutritional Information Per 1 Can (355 mL Serving): 0% ABV Calories- 60 Carbohydrates- 11 g Sugar- 11 g Vegan Certified Gluten Free

name: Flying Monkeys Just Puppy Dreams Non-Alcoholic Hard Seltzer
description: Do you love Flying Monkeys Supersonic Puppy Dreams Hard Seltzer but not so much the alcohol content? Then you are going to absolutely love their Just Puppy Dreams Seltzer with 0.0% ABV! Haven't tried either version but you're curious and want to know more? Imagine the pure joy of puppies playing in their dreams, so infectious that their happiness spills from their dreams into their adorable, furry bodies. Now put that same infectious joy into a hard seltzer for humans! The delicious pineapple-mango-orange creamsicle flavor combination in this unique non-alc seltzer delivers a burst of flavor reminiscent of freshly unwrapped juicy fruit gum mixed with a trendy seltzer cocktail from the coolest club where you're the star dancer, all delivered with the tongue-lolling smile of a happy puppy. And it's bubbly too! Flying Monkeys has managed to put all of this sparkling liquid joy into a bright and colourful fun can with only 30 calories and less than 1 g of sugar that we know you are going to love! Style: Pineapple - Mango - Orange Creamsicle Hard Seltzer

name: Bellwoods Brewery Non-Alcoholic Jelly King Dry Hopped Sour Raspberry &
description: Jelly King translates well to a non-alc version, as many of the flavours that make it so nice to drink come from the yeast and the bacteria used in the brewing process. They sour the base of both the beer and the non-alc in the same way, and this results in interesting, predominantly peachy characteristics brought on by mixed fermentation. This limited edition Non-Alc Jelly King variant was conditioned on loads of raspberries and blackberries. Tart, fruity and delicious! Notes: Raspberry, Blackberry Ingredients: Water, Malted barley, Wheat, Raspberry, Blackberry, Oats, Hops, Yeast Origin: Toronto, Ontario, Canada Nutritional Information Per 1 Can (473 mL Serving): 0.5% ABV Calories - 100 Carbohydrates - 20 g Sugars - 8 g

name: Barrfly Non-Alcoholic Sunny Margarita
description: Taste the vibrant natural tequila and lime flavors of Barrfly Sunny Margaritas non-alcoholic mocktails! These delicious alcohol free margaritas capture the essence of sunny days and are a perfectly refreshing and guilt-free indulgence. With only 60 calories and 50% less sugar than an alcoholic margarita-style drink, this non-alcoholic margarita can be enjoyed without limit! Flavours / Notes: tequila, lime, citrus Ingredients: carbonated water, cane sugar, natural flavour, citric acid, sodium citrate, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, ascorbic acid, tartrazine, brilliant blue FCF Origin: Québec, Canada Nutritional Information Per 1 Can (355 mL Serving): 0% ABV Calories- 60 Carbohydrates- 11 g Sugar- 11 g Vegan Certified

name: Bellwoods Brewery Stay Classy Non-Alcoholic IPA
description: Originating from Toronto, Ontario, Stay Classy pours just like a beer, with good head retention and a soft, pale yellow body. Multiple dry hop additions translate into pronounced hop aromatics and flavours - think citrus zest and yellow grapefruit alongside dank West Coast hop notes for good measure. It’s dry, refreshing and crushable, with a pleasantly bitter finish. Notes: Citrus, Grapefruit Ingredients: Water, malted barley, Wheat, Oats, Maltodextrin, Hops, Yeast Origin: Toronto, Ontario, Canada Nutritional Information Per 1 Can (473 mL Serving): <0.5% ABV Calories- 70 Carbohydrates - 12 g Sugar - 5 g

name: Belicious Peach Bellini Raw Honey Sparkling Beverage
description: When life gives you honey, make it bubbly! Belicious peach sparkling water uses antioxidant-rich raw honey to sweeten up your sipping game to pure, peachy perfection. Sip on the perfect harmony of sweet peachy goodness and delicate floral honey, all while enjoying the light and crisp dance of effervescent bubbles. Perfect for brunches, celebrations, or a relaxing evening, Belicious Peach Bellini offers all the sophistication without the alcohol. It's a non-alcoholic cocktail that's here to remind you that every moment really can be as sweet as honey! Flavours / Notes: Peachy, Crisp, Slightly sweet Ingredients: Carbonated water, Carbonated peach juice, Peach flavour, Raw honey, Citric acid Origin: Ontario, Canada Nutritional Information Per 1 Can (355 mL Serving): 0.0% ABV Calories- 35 Carbohydrates - 9g Sugar - 8g Gluten Free Non GMO

name: Flying Monkeys Lava Lamp Non-Alcoholic Session IPA
description: Discover the perfect craft beer for any occasion with Flying Monkeys Lava Lamp Non-Alcoholic Session IPA. This uniquely designed IPA combines Galaxy and Amarillo hop terpenes to create a vibrant blend of pomelo, grapefruit, and peach aromas. With a light and refreshing body and a touch of tropical flavor, this IPA is both sessionable and fabulous. Get your groove on and try it today! Flavours / Notes: tropical, citrus and peach Ingredients: Water, Malted Barley, Hops, Sugars (maltodextrin), Yeast Contains: Barley 0.5% ABV Calories - 85 Carbohydrates - 12 g Sugars - 2 g

name: Barrfly Non-Alcoholic Amaretto Sour
description: Barrfly's Amaretto Sour Cocktail is a flavour explosion that will blow you away! Experience the ultimate blend of flavors with notes of lemon, lemonade & almond, hints of cherry, peach, pear, and vanilla. This is a delicious and refreshing cocktail that's perfect for any time of day. Flavours / Notes: lemon, almond, cherry, peach, vanilla Ingredients: Carbonated water, cane sugar, natural flavour, citric acid, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, caramel, sodium citrate, ascorbic acid, tartrazine Origin: Québec, Canada Nutritional Information Per 1 Can (355 mL Serving): Calories- 60 Carbohydrates- 12 g Sugar- 11 g Vegan Certified Gluten-free

name: Chill Street Non-Alcoholic Strawberry Daiquiri
description: Introducing Chill Street Non-Alcoholic Strawberry Daiquiri, the perfect summer favourite for those looking to cool off without the alcohol. Enjoy the delicious taste of fresh strawberries and lime in a refreshing and guilt-free drink - no blender required! Pairs perfectly with nachos, grilled prawns, lobster rolls or burgers. Satisfy your cravings and keep things chill with this non-alcoholic treat. Flavours / Notes: strawberry, lime Ingredients: Water, Cane sugar, Natural flavours, Citric acid, Strawberry. Origin: Nova Scotia, Canada Alcohol: 0.4 % Calories: 90 Sugar: 27g Carbohydrates: 27g

name: Barrfly Non-Alcoholic Sangria
description: Experience a burst of flavor with Barrfly's refreshing ready-to-drink sangria! Perfect for hot summer days, this sangria blends dealcoholized wine with citrus and peach notes to excite your taste buds from the very first sip. Enjoy the ultimate summer beverage today! Flavours / Notes: citrus, peach Ingredients: Carbonated water, cane sugar, dealcoholized wine, natural flavour, grape skin extract, citric acid, lactic acid, malic acid, sodium citrate, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, caramel, ascorbic acid, amaranth, brilliant blue FCF. Origin: Québec, Canada Nutritional Information Per 1 Can (355 mL Serving): Calories- 80 Carbohydrates- 18 g Sugar- 18 g Vegan Certified Gluten-free

name: Bellwoods Brewery Non-Alcoholic Jelly King Dry Hopped Sour
description: Originating in Toronto, Ontario, Bellwoods Jelly King Dry Hopped Sour translates beautifully to a non-alcoholic version, maintaining the unique flavors that make it so enjoyable. The delightful taste comes from the yeast and bacteria used in the brewing process. Bellwoods sours the base of both the beer and the non-alcoholic version in the same way, resulting in interesting, predominantly peachy characteristics brought on by mixed fermentation. Flavours / Notes: Peach, Lemon Ingredients: Water, Malt barley, Wheat, Oats, Hops, Yeast Origin: Toronto, Ontario, Canada Nutritional Information Per 1 Can (473 mL Serving): <0.5% ABV Calories- 90 Carbohydrates - 19 g Sugar - 6 g

name: Edna's Non-Alcoholic Mojito
description: Edna's sparkling alcohol-free Mojito offers bright natural mojito mint and a smash of lime juice, with subtle Rum notes. Each recipe is carefully small-batch prepared with all natural juices, shrubs, extracts & oils to create complex, structured, characterful adaptations of their alcoholic aliases. No artificial flavours or additives. Notes: Mint, Lime, Fresh Ingredients: Carbonated Water, Cane Sugar, Apple Cider Vinegar, Lime Juice Concentrate, Natural Flavours Alcohol: 0.0% Calories: 105

name: Perth Brewery Unleashed Non-Alcoholic Amber
description: Let this deliciously well-balanced non-alcoholic Amber unleash your exuberance! Calories - 90 Carbohydrates - 14 g0.3% ABV

name: Lake of Bays Brewing Co. Near Zero Non-Alcoholic Lagered Ale
description: Submerge into Near Zero, a crisp lagered ale with all the flavour but none of the alcohol <0.5%). Clean and easy drinking with a gentle dry hop, this beer offers a toasted bread aroma and cereal in the body. It finishes semi sweet with notes of bread crust and honey. Near Zero delivers an intense taste that will leave you refreshed. TASTING NOTES: This non-alcoholic lagered ale has a cereal presence that adds depth and complexity to the beer, elevating it beyond a typical lager. It strikes a balance between light and medium-bodied, providing a delightful drinking experience. Malts: Carapils, Flaked Wheat Kettle Hops: Northern Brewer Dry Hop: Northern Brewer 15 Calories Carbohydrates - 0 g 0.5% ABV
